name: Grog Survives!?
description:
Can you survive as an ogre who’s hungry for sheep?  The nearby town of humans are out to stop you! Features!

Use your custom sheep jaw club to defend yourself!

-         Point and Click action

Learn new ways to smash the humans but also forget them along the way.

-         Power-ups! with keys 1, 2 and 3

Use their weapons against them to the best of your knowledge (as an ogre).

-         Throw their weapons back at them.

Ogres don’t usual travel this far into human territory but this one has developed an appetite for mutton.

-         Extra healthy Sheep

Witness the drive of the king and all that he sends to stop you.

-         Ever expanding regiment of soldiers.

Collect the trophies of the humans to bring back to your fellow ogres for honour.

-         High Score bragging. 

Details:

Release date you can set out on this adventure?

-         01/02/2018

Price to aid the ogre

-         Alpha build       : Free

-         Full game           : TBA

Contact the Developers:

-         Kieran.kd.dunn at gmail 

Use the power of your pc to aid in the ogre’s hunger.

Coming to android and IOS at a later date.
